name: Hagnet
description:
Made by:  You Jin Song & Jiyuan Zhan

Escape from a Mad Raccoon Scientist! Play as a hamster inside of a magnetic ball and utilize the magnetic devices around the maps to reach the ends of levels and escape from the lab! 

Features:

  • 2D Platformer
  • Cute and Mysterious Environment
  • One player game
  • Slow paced 
  • Scheme based platform

Game Controls:

  • Movement: A & D
  • Jump: Spacebar
  • Interfering with magnet: Spacebar

*This project is made for the Newschool: Parsons, sophomore year assignments in April 2019. *
